advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Obtain some Lifeless Alloy, Create's most important resource
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Apply Lifeless Alloy to a cardboard block, creating a basic casing for your machines
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_1: Lifeless Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_2: Whenever an Lifeless Tunnel has connections to the sides...
create.ponder.belt_casing.text_1: Lifeless or Living Casing can be used to decorate Mechanical Belts
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_1: Lifeless Funnels can only ever extract single items.
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_2: Gold Funnels can extract up to a full stack.
create.ponder.brass_tunnel.text_1: Gold Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.brass_tunnel.text_2: Gold Tunnels have filter slots on each open side
create.ponder.brass_tunnel.text_6: Gold Tunnels on parallel belts will form a group
create.ponder.brass_tunnel_modes.header: Distribution Modes of the Gold Tunnel
create.ponder.brass_tunnel_modes.text_1: The distribution behaviour of Gold Tunnels can be configured
create.ponder.cogwheel_casing.text_1: Lifeless or Living Casing can be used to decorate Cogwheels
create.ponder.shaft_casing.text_1: Lifeless or Living Casing can be used to decorate Shafts
create.ponder.mechanical_arm_filtering.t: Gold Funnels as Targets do however communicate their own filter to the Arm
create.ponder.weighted_ejector_tunnel.te: Combined with Gold Tunnels, Ejectors can split item stacks by specific amounts
First, configure the Gold Tunnel to 'Prefer Nearest', in order to prioritize its side output
advancement.create.brass.desc: Create Liquid Brass by alloying Liquid Copper and Zinc in your Mechanical Mixer and casting the result
advancement.create.copper_casing.desc: Apply Rose Gold Ingots to a cardboard block, creating a weak logistics casing for your machines
create.ponder.encased_fluid_pipe.text_1: Rose Golds Casing can be used to decorate Fluid Pipes
advancement.create.brass_casing.desc: Apply Livingwood to Brass Frames, creating a casing for more sophisticated machines
advancement.create.train_casing_00.desc: Apply Dreamwood to Netherite Frames, creating a casing for strong logistic components
create.ponder.train_assembly.text_5: Create new bogeys by using Netherites Casing on Tracks
create.train_assembly.requires_casing: Use Netherites Casing to create bogeys on tracks
create.station.how_to: Use Netherites Casing on highlighted Tracks to create bogeys.
advancement.create.water_wheel.desc: Place a Lava Wheel and use it to generate torque
create.ponder.large_water_wheel.header: Generating Rotational Force using Large Lava Wheels
create.ponder.large_water_wheel.text_1: Large Lava Wheels draw force from adjacent Fluid Currents
create.ponder.large_water_wheel.text_3: These rotate only at half the speed of regular lava wheels...
create.ponder.water_wheel.header: Generating Rotational Force using Lava Wheels
create.ponder.water_wheel.text_1: Water Wheels draw force from adjacent Fluid Currents
advancement.create.sturdy_sheet.desc: Assemble a Sturdy Sheet by refining Lead Sheets
